name: Lisa
title: Witch of Purple Rose
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
skills.description: Normal AttackPerforms up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.Charged AttackConsumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.Plunging AttackGathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.PressReleases a homing Lightning Orb.On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.HoldAfter an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
skills.info: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.
skills.info: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. Press Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
skills.info: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG. The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.
skills.info: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. Press Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
skills.info: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG. The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.
skills.info: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

passives.name: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

passives.name: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:·Increases DEF by 25%.·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Lightning Rose now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.This effect can only occur once every 5s.

outfits.name: Purple Rose
outfits.description: Lisa's outfit. A slim-fit dress adorned with roses that displays a young lady's elegance.
